p: To the best to our knowledge, shyobunone isomers are quite rare for Rh. tomentosum EOs. This sesquiterpenoid was identified in shoots during June, July, and August among minor constituents (up to 0.5%) ( Table 1). Recently, shyobunones have been determined in appreciable amounts (up to 5.7%) in the oils of marsh rosemary of Polish origin [ 18].
